channel.title: Jeph Loeb on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Jeph Loeb on jverkamp.com

item.title: The Ultimates 3: Who Killed the Scarlet Witch?
item.description:
The Ultimates are back! With new faces, new foes, and new deaths.

More or less.

It’s certainly a jam packed volume with lots of twists and action. Really, it’s mostly a prequel to Ultimatum. And that’s okay.

Onward!
